meanings.definition: To award a diploma to someone.
meanings.sent1: The school will be diplomaing the graduates next week.
meanings.sent2: After completing her studies, she will be diplomaing the students.
meanings.sent3: The principal was diplomaing students left and right, making it rain diplomas!
meanings.sent4: The university was diplomaing scholars who excelled in their fields.
meanings.sent5: The ceremony for diplomaing the students was a moment of pride for everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of receiving a diploma.
meanings.sent1: Her diplomaing brought tears of joy to her family.
meanings.sent2: The diplomaing of the graduates was a moment of celebration.
meanings.sent3: At the diplomaing ceremony, the students felt a sense of accomplishment.
meanings.sent4: The diplomaing marked the end of their academic journey.
meanings.sent5: The diplomaing was a symbol of their hard work paying off.

meanings.definition: The process of earning a diploma.
meanings.sent1: The diplomaing involved years of hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: She was excited to start the diplomaing process.
meanings.sent3: The diplomaing journey was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent4: The diplomaing required passing all the exams.
meanings.sent5: The diplomaing journey was filled with ups and downs.
